title: Remedy against EULA fraud
content:
As a remedy against possible EULA fraud, I uploaded samples of affidavits:

[http://www.sanskritweb.net/forgers/eula.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014125755/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/forgers/eula.pdf "http://www.sanskritweb.net/forgers/eula.pdf")

Sorry, the affidavit samples are in German language only.
author: Uli
